text: George Washington Gale Ferris, Jr. (January 15, 1869 â€“ November 22, 1896) was an American engineer. He is most known for creating the original Ferris wheel for the 1893 Chicago World's Columbian Exposition. ==References== ==Other websites== * Inventor of the Week * Ferris on the RPI Hall of Fame * NNDB "George Ferris" Category:1859 births Category:1896 deaths Category:Deaths from typhoid fever Category:Engineers from Illinois Category:Businesspeople from Illinois
title: George Washington Gale Ferris Jr.
